#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
	if(b==0)
	return a;
	else
	gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
	int t,n,q,i,g,l,r;
	int arr[100001];
	int pre_gcd[100002],post_gcd[100002];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&n,&q);
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		scanf("%d",(arr+i));
	
		pre_gcd[1]=arr[1];
		for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
		pre_gcd[i]=gcd(pre_gcd[i-1],arr[i]);
	/*	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		cout<<pre_gcd[i]<<" ";
		cout<<endl;*/
		post_gcd[n]=arr[n];
		for(i=n-1;i>=1;i--)
		post_gcd[i]=gcd(post_gcd[i+1],arr[i]);
		/*for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		cout<<post_gcd[i]<<" ";
		cout<<endl;*/
		while(q--)
		{
			scanf("%d %d",&l,&r);
			if(l==1)
			g=post_gcd[r+1];
			else if(r==n)
			g=pre_gcd[l-1];
			else
			g=gcd(pre_gcd[l-1],post_gcd[r+1]);
			printf("%d\n",g);
			}
		}
	return 0;
}
